10.title: Pac's Very Scary Halloween - Part One

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

10.plot: Dr. Pacenstein and Eeghost are plotting to ruin Pac's Halloween dinner plans at Transylpacia Castle and it's up to a scary neighbor to save the night.

11.title: Pac's Very Scary Halloween - Part Two

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

11.plot: When Dr. Pacenstein and his sidekick Eeghost swap bodies with Pac-Man, Spiral and Cyli try to scare up help from the doctor's neighbor, Count Pacula.

12.title: Santa Pac

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

12.plot: Events that take place exactly 1 year before the 2014 "Happy Holidays and a Merry Berry Day" episode. Pac-Man meets Santa-Pac when he has to rescue him and his round-deer from the Netherworld after he is kidnapped.

1.title: The Adventure Begins Part 1

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

1.plot: Thanks to the school bully, Pac-Man accidentally opens the portal to the netherworld, unleashing an army of ghosts, led by the fiery lord betrayus! Lucky for Pac-World, the Legend of Last Yellow Orb proves to be true: thanks to the ancient Tree Of Life, young pac has the ability to eat ghosts... And burp out their eyeballs! Wow! Unfortunately, the ghosts mange to steal the Tree Of Life, which could mean the end of Pac-World!

5.title: All You Can Eat

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

5.plot: Lord Betrayus plans to render Pac powerless - by getting Inky, Blinky, Pinky and Clyde to feed Pac so much he'll be too full to eat anything else... power berries or ghosts! But Pac isn't getting full, even when he's eating everything in both worlds!

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

8.plot: When Pac and his pals get blasted into the past, he not only finally meets his parents -- and his Baby Pac self - but has an adventure with them during PacWorld War I.

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

10.plot: Pac-Man is physically controlled by Betrayus when he swallows a special micro-chip, and Pac's friends must help him infiltrate the Netherworld spy-style to retrieve the remote controller.

13.title: Betrayus Turns the Heat Up

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

13.plot: PacWorld is becoming dangerously hot and its citizens mistakenly blame Sir C! Pac and Friends remain loyal to the elderly inventor and, together; they uncover a plot by Betrayus to terra-form PacWorld into a world just like the Netherworld prior to invasion and conquest.

16.plot: It looks like Betrayus" fortunes are changing when he summons a Nether-Witch to curse Pac Man with bad luck. The only catch is, the witch will only turn over the potion if Betrayus promises to marry her.

22.title: A Berry Scary Night

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

22.plot: The two moons of PacWorld turn blue every 100 Halloweens, so Betrayus summons the sinister Count Pacula to drain the last Yellow Orb in PacWorld.

25.title: The Spy Who Slimed Me

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

25.plot: There's a new threat to PacWorld, a debonair spy ghost named Specter. He possesses Aunt Spheria's dog Uggles, infiltrates Sir Cumference's lab, and proves to be a worthy adversary to Pac. To stop him, Pac gets help from an unexpected source.

26.title: Invasion of the Pointy Heads

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

26.plot: Apex, the Pointy-head alien, strikes a deal with the Netherworld to join forces and take over PacWorld, but Betrayus has no idea that the aliens are even more duplicitous than he is. There is only one chance for victory, Betrayus must give Pac-Man control over the entire ghost army... including Betrayus!

1.title: Ride the Wild Pac-topus

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

1.plot: When Pac is asked to hold on to a golden key, Dr. Buttocks tries to steal it by using his re-programmed mind-control chip to control attractions at a carnival.

2.title: Meanie Genie

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

2.plot: Pac is tricked into finding a bottle holding a genie who promises to grant his every wish. But, as they say, be careful what you wish for!

3.title: Cave PAC-MAN

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

3.plot: Dr. Buttock's latest shenanigans wind up defrosting a Prehistoric Cave-Kid, who is soon pursued by scientists bent on locking him away - including Dr. B - so Pac and Pals are finally forced to risk it all and travel back in time to return him to prehistoric PacWorld.

4.title: Cosmic Contest

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

4.plot: The cranky and omnipotent Overlords, woken from their Space Nap Supreme by the sounds of a PacWorld/Netherworld/Pointyhead battle Royale, force the combatants to compete in a crazy race through multiple dangerous locales to decide which planet will be banished to another dimension (allowing the Overlords to get some sleep).

5.title: That Smarts!

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

5.plot: In the absence of Sir C, Pacopolis needs a new genius, especially after Buttocks hacks Sir C's computer and builds a giant indestructible robot based on Grinder's design. Will the Brain Berry that Pac gobbles help him save the day, or will he end up being too smart for his own good?

6.title: Pac-Mania

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

6.plot: Pac-Man enjoys being a celebrity until a TV show being made about his life begins to make Pac, Cyli, and Spiral look like fools and Betrayus plans to use it for his own evil plans.

7.title: Rip Van Packle

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

7.plot: Pac is trying to locate the Pointy Planet (and his parents) when the aliens attack. Pac follows them into space, where he is swallowed by giant WORM hole and spat out 70 years in the future, to find his OLD friends have been living under Betrayus' rule ever since Pac disappeared.

8.title: Spooka-Bazooka!

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

8.plot: Pac-Man is "put out to pasture" when a new ghostcatching gizmo hits the market. But the Spooka-Bazooka is actually a fiendish Betrayus plot to conquer PacWorld.

9.title: The Pac Be with You

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

9.plot: When the ultimate super ninja ghost trains Betrayus' army, Pachas to learn a new fighting technique...from Blinky...?

10.title: The Shadow of the Were-Pac

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

10.plot: President Spheros decides to throw the spookiest Halloween party ever, but a series of mysterious Were-Pac attacks take scary to new heights, so Pac and pals must become super sleuths.

11.title: A Hard Dazed Knight

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

11.plot: When Dr. Buttocks coats some ancient armor with his newly invented "Buttanium," he creates a ghost army that not even Pac Man can chew through, while Sir C feels he's lost his edge and cannot create a counter weapon.

12.title: Cap'n Banshee and His Interstellar Buccaneers

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

12.plot: A summer sky cruise takes a turn for the worse when Pac and his pals are confronted by spectral space pirates bent on capturing Mooby Dick, a colossal cosmic cow.

13.title: Happy Holiday and a Merry Berry Day

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

13.plot: As the holidays approach, Pac gets a surprise visit from his parents, who are on a "top-secret mission" that compels him to hide them from even his closest friends, who become increasingly suspicious something is very wrong... and they may be very right.

14.title: Peace Without Slime: Part I

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

14.plot: Pac-World's election is coming up and Betrayus uses Obtuse as a puppet candidate. He rigs the election and wins, hoping to find the Tree of Life and the Repository.

15.title: The Ghost Behind the Throne: Part II

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

15.plot: Following Obtuse becoming President of Pac-World in a rigged election, Pac has to act fast to keep the planet's new ruler from turning over the Tree of Life and the Repository to the real power behind the throne: Betrayus!

16.title: The Nerd Is the Word

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

16.plot: Utt-lergets roped into infiltrating Pac-Man's dorm, disguised as an exchange student so that he can find psychological weaknesses for Betrayus to exploit.

17.title: The Bride of Grinder

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

17.plot: Grinder decides to build a female version of himself, known as "Gridette". But when he fails to bring her to life, Dr. Buttocks captures Grindette for his evil plans to get information about the Tree of Life and the Repository.

18.title: The Legend of Creepy Hollow

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

18.plot: On a camp-out, Skeebo pranks Pac, Cyli and Spiral by making them believe a legendary monster is real. The trio decide to prank him back, not knowing Betrayus is about to get into the act with his own monster.

19.title: Easter Egg Island

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

19.plot: The Easter Peep settles an old score with Betrayus, stealing his subjects and leaving him ruler of an empty Netherworld. The despicable despot has to swallow his sizable pride to elicit Pac's assistance in recovering his lost lackeys, but will Betrayus betray Pac before the stolen ghosts are rescued from Easter Egg Island? Oh, probably.

20.title: The Wizard of Odd

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

20.plot: Dr. Buttocks attracts a space worm to PacWorld, and Pac and Fuzbitz are sucked into it and zapped into an Oz-like dimension called Odd.

21.title: Indiana Pac and the Dentures of Doom

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

21.plot: The diabolical dentures of an evil Mummy wizard could cause the destruction of PacWorld if they are reunited with their malicious master. It's a race against time as the forces of PacWorld and the Netherworld strive to find the missing mouthpiece. But the dentures have a mind of their own, plus they bite hard!

22.title: Honey, I Digitized the Pac-Man

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

22.plot: When Dr. Buttocks infects all the computers of Pac-World with his virus ghosts, a digitized Pac must travel through cyberspace and stop the invasion before the evil scientist can download the location of the Repository and the Tree of Life.

26.title: New Girl in Town

episode of.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures (TV Series 2013–2015)

26.plot: When Spheros' and Betrayus' teenage niece visits Pacopolis, she and Pac become smitten. So Betrayus devises a plan to use his niece against Pac.

imdb.title: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures
plot: Pacman saves pacworld from ghosts with his friends Cyli and Spiral.
